libpng
libjpeg
libimagequant
libexif
libtiff
libwebp
zlib

Do before.
LDFLAGS="-static"

--enable-static --disable-shared \
--with-png-includes=$PWD/../libvips-deps/libpng  --with-png-libraries=$PWD/../libvips-deps/vipsbuildlibs \
--with-jpeg-includes=$PWD/../libvips-deps/libjpeg  --with-jpeg-libraries=$PWD/../libvips-deps/vipsbuildlibs \
--with-tiff-includes=$PWD/../libvips-deps/libtiff/libtiff  --with-tiff-libraries=$PWD/../libvips-deps/vipsbuildlibs \
--with-zlib-includes=$PWD/../libvips-deps/zlib  --with-zlib-libraries=$PWD/../libvips-deps/vipsbuildlibs
